title: HR Assistant
job_overview:
Remote HR Assistant


About Connected Health Care
Connected Health Care is a top-rated U.S.-based healthcare staffing firm specializing in placing clinicians and allied professionals across the country. As we continue to grow, we are seeking a highly organized and proactive HR Assistant to work directly with our HR Manager in supporting our internal people operations.


What You’ll Do

You’ll help keep our HR department organized, responsive, and effective by assisting with a wide range of day-to-day administrative responsibilities.

Key Responsibilities:

Assist the HR Manager with a variety of daily admin tasks and team communications
Maintain and update internal HR documents, SOPs, and shared resources
Organize and track HR-related projects, deadlines, and recurring processes
Coordinate calendar appointments, meetings, and reminders
Perform light inbox management (e.g., flagging emails, drafting responses)
Help prepare HR memos, internal announcements, and onboarding materials
Update and organize employee data in HR tools and spreadsheets
Conduct light research on HR vendors, policies, and best practices
Create simple reports or summaries from internal documentation as needed
Assist with preparing presentations, checklists, and training templates
Maintain confidentiality and discretion when handling sensitive information

Who You Are

1–2+ years of experience in HR support, admin assistance, or operations
Strong written and spoken English communication
Detail-oriented, responsive, and reliable
Proficiency with Microsoft Excel and experience using HRIS platforms (e.g., Rippling, Paycom, ADP)Familiar with (or quick to learn) HR systems and admin workflows
Previous Staffing Experience is a plus!
Self-starter with excellent follow-through and time management
Able to work full-time during U.S. business hours (CST preferred)
